Description.Text:
The Edge Manchester is the ultimate in short stay and serviced accommodation. Why stay in a hotel when one can enjoy the luxury, convenience and privacy of a fully furnished apartment, right in the heart of the city centre? Our boutique style apartments offer you more for your money and a better travel experience than a conventional luxury hotel. Included in your stay is 24/7 concierge, Free wireless internet access in all rooms, Secure allocated car parking, Two lifts to all floors, Luxurious 100% Egyptian cotton bed linen, Perfect city centre location, Apartment can be serviced/cleaned daily, weekly or as per your requirements, Luxury Ben De Lisi designed interiors including Axor Terrano taps, oversized power showers by Hansgrohe and white sanitary ware by French designers Villeroy and Boch. Decked balcony with views towards The Lowry hotel and the River Irwell, Fully furnished including huge 42" plasma tv with Freeview satellite and DVD player, iPod docking station and DAB radio alarm. Fully equipped Individually designed Italian MESON kitchens including fridge and freezer, microwave, integrated oven and hob, espresso maker, tea making facilities, crockery and cooking utensils. Iron and ironing board, Washing machine, Hairdryer. Solid Canadian Walnut flooring. The building also has a secure alarm, intercom to entrance and 24/7 concierge. PLEASE NOTE: Late night parties are not permitted at any time and reports of this from the concierge may result in additional charges. This apartment has its own secure allocated parking space, which one is free to use for the duration of stay. Please also note, the concierge is primarily there for the long term residents of the building and not for short term or overnight guests.
***PLEASE NOTE CHECK IN TIMES ARE RESTRICTED AS FOLLOWS AND KEYS ARE NOT HELD ONSITE BY THE CONCIERGE, THEY MUST BE PICKED UP FROM OUR NEARBY OFFSITE OFFICE: You can ONLY pick up keys for the apartment from our offsite key collection office at the following times: Mon-Fri 8am-6pm Sat & Sun: 10am-7pm. ADDRESS: Mailboxes Etc, 275 Deansgate, Manchester M3 4EL. Check in is from 15:00, and check out is before 12:00. Please email info@theedgemanchester.com before you make your booking if you want to check in outside of these times as it is normally not possible. Your booking is subject to this restriction and we do not offer refunds for arrivals outside these times without prior arrangement.
If you arrive early, there is a car park beside the Edge on Chapel Street that currently offers parking for approximately 4 GBP per day if parking for more than one car is needed or if you need to park somewhere before your check in time at 3pm. If you want to leave your luggage in the key collection office before official check in time of 3pm, you can do so, there is small charge per bag for this.

Driving directions from Manchester Airport: Take the M56 to the City Centre. At the 1st roundabout, take the exit St. Peters Square. Follow Deansgate signs. Take a left on Blackfriars Street, then the first left onto Chapel Street, then the third left onto Clowes Street. Est. taxi fare 18.00 (one way) Driving directions from Liverpool Airport: Take M6 North towards Manchester and Exit onto M56 to A5130 Princess Parkway at roundabout, straight over onto Medlock Street, left onto Whitworth Street, right onto Deansgate, Second Street on your left for Blackfriars Street. Take the first left onto Chapel Street, then the third left onto Clowes Street. The apartment block is at the end. For SatNav directions, set it to find Clowes Street in Manchester, not the postcode. Est. taxi fare 65.00 (one way) Trains: The nearest stations are Manchester Victoria, Manchester Piccadilly and Manchester Oxford Road.

Luxury Studio Apartment - This studio offers one double bed and one double sofa bed IN ONE OPEN PLAN SPACE (i.e. there is not a separate bedroom) with ipod docking alarm clock, balcony/terrace, bathroom toiletries, cable/satellite TV, washing machine & dryer, color 42" plasma TV, DVD player, kitchen with all cooking facilities, crockery / cutlery, kettle, toaster, fridge/freezer, microwave oven, stove / oven, tea and coffee making facilities including Nespresso coffee machine, ensuite private bathroom with power shower, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron/ironing board,laundry service.
